channel.title: Minimalism on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Minimalism on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 17
item.description: This week I freed (i.e. open sourced) a bot that claimed the reward from frebitco.in automatically, it served me for over a year but as I withdrew everything from the page I no longer care if anybody uses it. [blog-post] High quality GIF with FFmpeg A quick post that teaches you how to make GIFs from sections of videos usin ffmpeg, I think there is not an easier way of maing gifs than this, just a quick command and you are ready to go.
